question.text:
Match the following and select the correct option for ribosomes and its constituent rRNA.
 
(i) 50 s (a) 16 s
(ii) 30 s (b) 18 s
(iii) 40 s (c) 23 s
(iv) 60 s (d) 5.8 s

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi></math>

solution.text: Ribosome is ribonucleoprotein which is made up of rRNA and different types of protein. 80S ribosome consists of 40S and 60S subunits, 40S subunit consists of 18S rRNA and 60S consists of 28S, 5.8S and 5S rRNA. 70S ribosome has two subunits 30S and 50S, 30S consists of 16S rRNA and 50S consists of 23S and 5S rRNA.
